document_data.name: Cymbals
document_data.mainbody: '''Cymbals''' were a percussion{{Cite dragon/202/Magic to a Different Beat}}<ref> They were also used by [[rock gnome]]s<ref> and in certain [[Khazari]] [[monasteries]].<ref><ref>
document_data.Description: Cymbals consisted of two round thin plates made of [[brass]], which were slammed together to produce sound. A pair of cymbals typically had a diameter of {{SI|18|inches|long=yes}}, weighed {{SI|4|lb|k|long=yes}} and costed 20 [[gold piece]]s. A smaller version called finger cymbals was also used in Zakhara.<ref>
